about_the_game:
Welcome to Esports Manager, where your journey to esports glory begins! Dive headfirst into the adrenaline-pumping world of competitive gaming as you take on the role of an esports organization manager. Forge your path to greatness by creating your very own organization or selecting from a pool of over 100+ existing ones. The Major awaits, and victory is within reach – assemble your dream team and claim the championship!

Features

Real Organizations, Real Players: Immerse yourself in the esports universe with hundreds of authentic organizations and over 1000 real esports CS:GO players. The stage is set for you to build an unbeatable squad.

Player Market Dynamics: Take control of your team's destiny by navigating the player market. Buy, sell, or loan players from other teams to construct the ultimate all-star lineup. Your decisions will shape the future of your organization.

Player Development: Elevate your players to new heights by honing their skills, boosting morale, and enhancing physical attributes. From psychologist sessions to teambuilding events, make strategic choices in a limited training week.

Tournament Triumph: Compete in a variety of tournaments and events, with the ultimate goal of reaching the prestigious "Grand Slam." Lead your organization to the top of the rankings and etch your name in esports history.

Player Interaction: Forge connections with your players, understanding their motivations, and influencing their performance. Your leadership skills will play a crucial role in the success of your team.

Build Your Dream Team: Expand beyond players and hire a diverse staff, including analysts, trainers, junior managers, newsmakers, and digital/marketing specialists. Every decision counts in your quest for esports dominance.

Organization Expansion: Feel the thrill of growth as you acquire new organizations and establish your presence in the competitive scene. Develop your brand, secure lucrative deals with companies, increase revenue, and assemble an unstoppable team.

Strategic Gameplay: Tailor your game tactics to outsmart the competition. Every move you make on and off the virtual battlefield will shape the destiny of your organization.

Embark on a thrilling esports adventure where every decision counts, and the glory of victory awaits. Are you ready to become the ultimate Esports Manager? The game is on!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT, AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 - requires 256MB VRAM and DirectX® 11
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
